title: K400 Series Features
description: Say Hello To Keurig 2.0 K400 Series Brewing System. The K400 Series brewer features a 70 ounce water reservoir, large color touch display, programmable clock, an auto brew option, and a strength control setting.

asset.author: Keurig Inc
asset.hookText: Say Hello To Keurig® 2.0 K400 Series Brewing System.  The K400 Series brewer features a 70 ounce water reservoir, large color touch display, programmable clock, an auto brew option, and a strength control setting.

transcripts: Say hello to the next generation of Keurig. The Keurig 2.0 K400 series. Keurig 2.0 is the first Keurig system to brews a cup and a carafe at he touch of a button. Choose a K-cup pack  to brews a single cup or a K-carafe pack to brew a four cup carafe. It's so smart, so simple, so Keurig with Keurig 2.0 brewing technology design to read each portion pack lid to brew the perfect beverage every time. Keurig 2.0 K400 series features a 70-ounce water reservoir, color touch display, 9 brew sizes, strength control, programmable clock , auto off, customizable features to make it your own like wallpapers and auto brew. Say hello to more that 250+ varieties from 401 brands you know and love all with the guarantee of Keurig quality . So you always know you're brewing the best. So smart, so simple, so Keurig .
